projects.name: Imitator
description: Imitator is a game that forced player to copy enemies' bullets once they eliminated the enemies. This game requires player to think about which enemies should be killed and what kind of bullets will counter different types of enemies. After player killed the boss, they will have a powerful bullet type but it will be easily replaced after player kill tons of normal enemies.
projects.extra: Some computers may need to download Visual C++ Redistibutable in order to run this game, click here

projects.name: Dinder
description: Mobile app that will search through the database to provide random recipe to the user. It will generate recipe according to the user preferences. Swipe Right and Left to Like and Dislike the recipe.
Group project with Zahra Ahmed and Afifa Asad

projects.name: Music Shooter
description: This is normal horizontal scrolling game for learning the concept of vertical scrolling. Most assets were drawn by myself such as player, enemies and bullets and the rest are from open game art!
projects.extra: Some computers may need to download Visual C++ Redistibutable in order to run this game, click here

projects.name: Ball Game
description: This is a coding practice gmae that based on the game rule of a mobile app game : BBTAN from 111%, I also added more tools and different setting in order to make the game funnier

projects.name: Flying Undersized Controlled Killer
description: Flying Undersized Controlled Killer is a game about a fly who is trying to kill human with his ability. The fly can split on different enemies and eliminate them but it would be more difficult for it to do that with human. Therefore, it will need to take a block from the ground and drop above the human.
Group project with Mohamed Kazma and Jeremy Melone

projects.name: waltercheng.com(this website!)
description: Starting from a template and based on my own knowledge to build up this website!
